content: is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way day 5 english lavender row 99-116 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge increase pattern as row 9 & 10 knit until row 116 introducing cc lavender 1 & green 1 as needed the lavender motif has a 7 stitch repeat so you may want to add stitch markers every 7 stitches to remind you of the repeat cut cc s lavender 1 & green 1 leaving tails to sew in later stitch count 3 + 57 + 3 = 63 copyright 2024 suzi ashworth for folkestone harbour yarn day 4 strawberries row 79 - 98 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge increase pattern as row 9 & 10 knit until row 98 introducing cc red 1 & green 1 as needed the strawberry motif has a 13 stitch repeat so you may want to add stitch markers every 13 stitches to remind you of the repeat note row 92 is the first time you will be knitting with 3 different colours/strands of yarn in this project see colourwork tips section below for help managing your strands cut cc s red 1 & green 1 leaving tails to sew in later stitch count 3 + 48 + 3 = 52 this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way day 3 - honeybee row 61- 78 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge increase pattern as row 9 & 10 knit until row 78 introducing cc brown 1 & cc yellow 1 as needed cut cc brown 1 & cc yellow 1 leaving tails to sew in later rejoin mc white stitch count 3 + 38 + 3 = 44 copyright 2024 suzi ashworth for folkestone harbour yarn day 2 - tulips row 37- 60 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge increase pattern as row 9 & 10 knit until row 60 introducing cc green 1 & cc yellow 1 as needed cut mc & cc green 1 leaving tails to sew in later do not cut cc yellow 1 stitch count 3 + 29 + 3 = 35 this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way note i am absolutely aghast that i sent out the original version of day 1 with the wrong chart attached to it the attached chart was a draft copy not the checked and proof read version this is not how i wanted to start the month and i am very very sorry day 1 - corrected in main colour white cast on 6 stitches using 3mm needles the increases along the left side and i cord edging are worked the same every time until midway through day 13 when instructions
